title: Rising Waters
description: Unusually heavy rains have the river overflowing its banks. Townsfolk are sure that several feet of water may flood the town!

resolutions.preDescription: Create a dam by dismantling some peon's cottages
Have the whole citizenry start filling sandbags
resolutions.postDescription: After a few hours, the village is safe from the flood.

resolutions.preDescription: Board up the mansions, it's everyone for themself!
Evacuate the populace to higher ground

title: Livestock Rustlers
description: A group of farmers from outlying areas are asking for protection from thieves who are stealing pigs and cattle. They want guardsmen stationed at outposts to help chase down the rustlers.

resolutions.preDescription: Recruit some new militiamen to man the rural outposts
Rotate city guards across the new rural outposts
Make cattle rustling a hanging crime.
Suggest that the farmers build larger fences and decoy barns.
